price: Hundi isaanii ergamtoota sobsiisan malee hin hafne. Kanaafuu adabbiin (kiyya) isaan irratti mirkanaa’e.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
